contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of December 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The order of the Superi- or Court is REVERSED. See Commonwealth v. Eller, 569 Pa. 622, 807 A.2d 838 (2002).
Justice EAKIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
